summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for, the construction, furnishing and equipping of a public auditorium, arena and recreation field on Blocks 44, 45, 52 and 53, D.T. Denny's Home Addition to North Seattle, authorizing and directing the Board of Public Works to prepare and adopt plans and specifications therefor and proceed with the construction, furnishing and equipiing thereof, making an appropriation therefor, and appropriating Forty Thousand ($40,000.00) Dollars from the Seattle General Municipal Improvement Bond, 1924 Construction Fund to the Seattle Auditorium Bonds, 1927 Construction Fund, as a temporary loan.
